entry.data:
WIDESPREAD FROST THIS MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
